div.p: TO HELP YOUR SLEEPING UNLESS YOU LIVE IN COLORADO AND
WASHINGTON DO WHAT YOU WANT. FINALLY TONIGHT, FACTOR TIP OF
THE DAY. LOOKING GOOD IN THE USA
YOU'RE SLOPPY, VISIBLE TATTOOS, A SCORPION ON THE
NECK OR GENERALLY DISHEVELED, WORD OF THE DAY, DISHEVELED,
YOU WILL NOT MAKE AS MUCH MONEY AS A NEAT AMERICAN WOULD
UNLESS YOU'RE A NBA PLAYER OR A RAPPER.
I'M NOT QUALIFIED TO COMMENT ON THE APPEARANCES OF THE
LADIES, BUT YOU GUYS, LISTEN UP.
SEE THIS BLAZER? LOOKS SHARP, RIGHT?
LOOK SHARP, KINKY FREEDMAN, AMERICAN CLOTHING MAKER.
AND THE SHIRT, THE TIE BROOKS BROTHERS, PUT IT TOGETHER,
NOT THAT EXPENSIVE. DON'T BUY A JACKET FROM A GUY
NAMED SHECKY, GET THE GOOD STUFF AND IT WILL PAY OFF.
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY. PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS
FACTOR WEBSITE AND THEN SPOUT ON THE FACTOR, ON WORD THE
